questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and buildings
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A busy street
C) A modern building
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A glass building
C) A natural landscape
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A glass building
C) A person
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A beach
C) The sky with clouds
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A river
B) A road
C) Trees and greenery
D) A playground

What is the weather like in the photo?
A) Rainy
B) Sunny with clouds
C) Snowy
D) Stormy

What can be seen reflected on the building?
A) Trees
B) Clouds and trees
C) People
D) Cars

What is the shape of the building in the photo?
A) Square
B) Circular
C) Rectangular
D) Oval

What color is the building in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Glass/mirrored
D) White

What is the condition of the sky?
A) Clear blue
B) Overcast
C) Partly cloudy
D) Night sky

How does the building interact with its surroundings?
A) It blends in with the natural environment
B) It stands out prominently
C) It is hidden among other buildings
D) It is surrounded by water

What time of day might it be in the photo?
A) Morning
B) Afternoon
C) Evening
D) Night

What is the architectural style of the building?
A) Classical
B) Gothic
C) Modern
D) Baroque

What feature of the building is most noticeable?
A) Its height
B) Its glass facade
C) Its color
D) Its decorations

What element of nature is prominently reflected on the building?
A) Trees
B) Water
C) Clouds
D) Mountains

What is the relationship between the building and the sky?
A) The sky is reflected on the building’s surface
B) The building blocks the sky
C) The sky is not visible
D) The sky is behind the building

How tall is the building in the photo?
A) Short
B) Medium height
C) Tall
D) Very tall

What is the predominant color in the photo?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the texture of the building’s surface?
A) Rough
B) Smooth and reflective
C) Wooden
D) Brick

What is the position of the building in the photo?
A) To the left
B) To the right
C) Centered
D) In the background

What kind of trees are visible in the photo?
A) Palm trees
B) Evergreen trees
C) Deciduous trees
D) No trees

What kind of clouds are in the sky?
A) Cumulus clouds
B) Stratus clouds
C) Nimbus clouds
D) No clouds

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright and natural
B) Dim and artificial
C) Dark and shadowy
D) Colorful and vibrant

How does the building's shape affect its appearance?
A) It makes it look traditional & It makes it look modern and sleek
B) It makes it look modern and sleek
C) It makes it look old and worn
D) It makes it look small and cozy

What is the primary material of the building's exterior?
A) Brick
B) Wood
C) Glass
D) Metal

What is the effect of the clouds on the building’s appearance?
A) They make it look dark and gloomy
B) They enhance its reflective quality
C) They obscure the building
D) They have no effect

How does the greenery in the foreground contribute to the photo?
A) It adds a natural contrast to the building
B) It makes the scene look crowded
C) It distracts from the building
D) It is not noticeable

What is the building's facade made of?
A) Stone
B) Glass
C) Concrete
D) Wood

What kind of reflections are visible on the building?
A) Reflections of other buildings
B) Reflections of the sky and clouds
C) Reflections of people
D) Reflections of the ground

What is the relationship between the building and the trees?
A) The trees are taller than the building
B) The trees are shorter than the building
C) The trees are the same height as the building
D) There are no trees

What is the building's height relative to its surroundings?
A) It is the tallest structure
B) It is shorter than other structures
C) It is the same height as other structures
D) There are no other structures

What type of windows does the building have?
A) Small and numerous
B) Large and few
C) Continuous glass panels
D) No windows

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Balanced with the building centered
B) Off-center with the building to one side
C) Crowded with many elements
D) Minimalist with few elements

How does the sky contribute to the photo?
A) It adds a sense of openness
B) It makes the photo look dark
C) It is not visible
D) It makes the photo look cluttered

What kind of environment surrounds the building?
A) A park
B) A cityscape
C) A beach
D) A mountain range

How does the building's surface interact with light?
A) It absorbs light
B) It reflects light

D) It blocks light

D) It creates a sense of warmth

B) Arches
C) Glass panels
D) Balconies

B) The sky above
C) The surrounding buildings
D) The people around

What is the overall theme of the photo?
A) Urban modernity

A) A historical monument
